itt.t00154755.mouseserver

Class RobotController

  • java.lang.Object
    • itt.t00154755.mouseserver.ServerUtils
      • itt.t00154755.mouseserver.RobotController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class RobotController
extends ServerUtils
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Since:
    10/02/2015
    Version:
    2.0 This class controls the mapping of the accelerometer readings to the cursor on the screen. It's also controls the moveClicked() and KeyPressed() method of the robot object.
    Author:
    Christopher Donovan, RobotController.java

      • run

        public void run()
        This run() method overrides the Runnable run() method. This method determines if the incoming packet should be sent to the moveCursor() or mouseClicked() method based on the first value in the array. It does this every 100m/s
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
